special_text:
Whenever you activate a loyalty ability, create an Aether token. [i](It's an enchantment with “Sacrifice two Aether: Draw a card.”)[/i]
[+2]: Until your next turn, you may cast spells as though they had flash.
[-3]: Exile up to two other target permanents. Players may play cards the own exiled this way without paying their mana costs.
[-8]: Gain control of target permanent.
